body_html:
To fix the error messages, the bazel build command should be:
bazel build --config opt --config cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

-c opt != --config opt
-c means "--compilation_mode"
body_text:
To fix the error messages, the bazel build command should be:
bazel build --config opt --config cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
-c opt != --config opt
-c means "--compilation_mode"
body:
To fix the error messages, the bazel build command should be:
`bazel build --config opt --config cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

`-c opt` != `--config opt`
-c means "--compilation_mode"
